issues.description: Hero 2-column layout may fail 8-second comprehension test if left column becomes text-heavy
issues.rationale: 60/40 split with H1 + 3 bullets + CTA could overwhelm scanning behavior and delay value recognition

issues.description: Moving pricing after Suite section may bury conversion decision point too deep in scroll flow
issues.rationale: Users expect pricing visibility earlier; late placement increases abandonment risk before price discovery

issues.description: Sticky CTA at 40% scroll may activate too late for impatient mobile users seeking quick conversion
issues.rationale: Mobile users often decide within first 20% scroll; delayed CTA misses early conversion intent

issues.description: Audit log pattern section adds cognitive load without clear conversion benefit placement
issues.rationale: New trust section increases page length; unclear if observability features drive purchase decisions

issues.description: Section reordering pushes How It Works deeper, potentially confusing users about product mechanics
issues.rationale: Users need operational clarity before trust details; delayed explanation may increase hesitation

issues.description: Proof bar under hero may create visual clutter if not properly spaced from CTA elements
issues.rationale: Additional horizontal elements near hero CTA can dilute focus and reduce click-through rates

issues.description: 75ch line length may be too wide for comfortable mobile reading in landscape orientation
issues.rationale: Optimal mobile reading requires shorter line lengths; 75ch could strain mobile comprehension

issues.description: Button hierarchy with outlined secondary may reduce perceived importance of secondary actions
issues.rationale: Outlined buttons can appear less actionable; may hurt demo/trial conversion rates

issues.description: Neutral background #f5f5f5 may reduce contrast for accessibility on secondary elements
issues.rationale: Light gray backgrounds can compromise text contrast ratios and affect readability for some users

issues.description: Card spacing of 20px may create insufficient visual separation on mobile viewport constraints
issues.rationale: Mobile screens need tighter spacing; 20px gaps may waste precious vertical real estate

suggestedFixes.fix: Limit left column to H1 + 2 bullets max, use 50/50 split on mobile, test 8-second comprehension
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces cognitive load while maintaining value clarity and mobile-first approach

suggestedFixes.fix: Position pricing immediately after hero section, use collapsible detailed view for complex tiers
suggestedFixes.rationale: Captures price-sensitive users early while allowing deeper exploration for interested prospects

suggestedFixes.fix: Trigger sticky CTA at 20% scroll, use slide-up animation, include pricing hint in CTA text
suggestedFixes.rationale: Catches early conversion intent while providing pricing context to reduce friction

suggestedFixes.fix: Integrate audit log as sidebar widget in pricing section, limit to 3 recent actions max
suggestedFixes.rationale: Connects trust signals directly to purchase decision point without adding page length

suggestedFixes.fix: Keep How It Works before trust sections, use progressive disclosure for detailed features
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains logical flow from problem to solution to mechanics to proof

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 40px margin below hero CTA, use subtle background to separate from primary actions
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains visual hierarchy while providing trust signals without CTA interference

suggestedFixes.fix: Set mobile line length to 45ch max, desktop to 65ch, test readability across devices
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes reading experience for each viewport while maintaining design consistency

suggestedFixes.fix: Use ghost buttons for secondary actions, maintain visual weight through color and sizing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Preserves hierarchy while ensuring secondary actions remain discoverable and actionable

suggestedFixes.fix: Use #f8f8f8 background, ensure 7:1 contrast for all text, test with accessibility tools
suggestedFixes.rationale: Improves accessibility compliance while maintaining clean aesthetic and premium feel

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 16px spacing on mobile, 24px on desktop, implement responsive gap system
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes space usage per viewport while maintaining visual breathing room
